## chi squared test, p value, stray from normal

```{r csv, include=TRUE}
bee_data <- read.csv("~/Desktop/Pollen_id_Yourstone_et_al_2023 copy.csv", sep = ';', header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
bee_data
head(bee_data)
```

```{r calculating proportions, include=TRUE}
total_species_count <- (Phacelia + Laburnum + Pulmonaria_Group + Aesculus + Cytisus + Papaver + Prunus_Group_B + Salix + Lonicera + Acer + Lamium + Brassicaceae + Prunus)
total_species_count
percentage_Phacelia<- (Phacelia / total_species_count)*100
percentage_Phacelia
```
